name: edges
title: Edges
description: In GeoPressureR, we uses `edges` (of a graph; See more information on the movement model in the [GeoPressureManual](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureManual/trajectory.html)) to extract flight information from GeoPressureP [`paths`](geopressurer/paths) using path2edge().

fields.name: tag_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the tag. Foreign key to [`tags.tag_id`](/GeoLocator-DP/core/tags#tag_id).

fields.name: stap_s
fields.description: Identifier of the SOURCE stationary period. Foreign key to [`staps.stap_id`](/GeoLocator-DP/geopressurer/staps#stap_id)

fields.name: stap_t
fields.description: Identifier of the TARGET stationary period. Generally `stap_s+1` except if `include=FALSE` for intermediate stap_id. Foreign key to [`staps.stap_id`](/GeoLocator-DP/geopressurer/staps#stap_id).

fields.name: lat_s
fields.description: Latitude of source the stationary period.

fields.name: lon_s
fields.description: Longitude of the source stationary period.

fields.name: lat_t
fields.description: Latitude of the target stationary period.

fields.name: lon_t
fields.description: Longitude of the target stationary period.

fields.name: s
fields.description: Index of the 2D coordinate of the source stap. See [`paths.ind`](geopressurer/paths#ind) for more information

fields.name: t
fields.description: Index of the 2D coordinate of the target stap. See [`paths.ind`](geopressurer/paths#ind) for more information

fields.name: j
fields.description: Unique identifier for each simulated trajectory, integer from `1` to `nj` as defined in [`GeoPressureR::graph_simulation()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/graph_simulation)`.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date and time of the start of the flight. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`.

fields.name: end
fields.description: Date and time of the end of the flight. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`.

fields.name: distance
fields.description: distance of the flight in km.

fields.name: bearing
fields.description: Direction of the flight in degree. 0 indicates north, positive indicate eastward direction, and negative indicate westward direction.

fields.name: gs_u
fields.description: The average groundspeed of the entire flight along the longitudinal axis (east-west direction), measured in kilometers per hour (km/h).

fields.name: gs_v
fields.description: The average groundspeed of the entire flight along the latitudinal axis (north-south direction), measured in kilometers per hour (km/h).

fields.name: ws_u
fields.description: The average windspeed of the entire flight along the longitudinal axis (east-west direction), measured in kilometers per hour (km/h).

fields.name: ws_v
fields.description: The average windspeed of the entire flight along the latitudinal axis (north-south direction), measured in kilometers per hour (km/h).
